game.name: Offroad Car Race
game.description:
The best driver will win the race! Do you have the skill to get you rewarded with this title? If yes, then why do you need to waste your time anymore. Join Offroad Car Race and gear up to have an awesome racing experience! Your objective in this brand new car challenge is to drive a wonderful car and reach the finish line first to win each race. Choose your level and get ready to enter the biggest racing competition of your city!

There are 8 unique and addictive levels to play through and you cannot move to the advanced level until you clear the present one. This challenge is not going to be as easy as you thought of since you have to race against a host of other players. In the initial levels, you can secure any position to win the race, but you have to get at least 3rd position to win in the further advanced levels. Use your driving abilities to drive your car through all the levels!

Race your vehicle through several most beautiful locations ranging from the greenery environment to the snowy mountains! Jump over the other obstacles and leave your competitors behind in this one of the best HTML5 games for boys! Head to the track and get ready to all of your rivals to wear the crown of being an ultimate hill driving champion! Good luck to guide your blue car across multiple tracks and locations!
